mapper.select: SELECT se.studentid,se.gradeid,se.evaluatorid,te.username,cs.html,cs.oracle,cs.js,cs.java_base,cs.java_high,cs.l1, se.appraisal_score,se.appraisal_content FROM school_evaluation se LEFT JOIN teacher te ON se.evaluatorid = te.teacherid LEFT JOIN course_score cs on se.studentid = cs.studentid WHERE se.studentid = #{studentno}
